data.lyric:
[ti:You're Mines Still(feat. Drake) (Explicit)]
[ar:Yung Bleu/Drake]
[al:You're Mines Still (feat. Drake) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You're Mines Still(feat. Drake) (Explicit) - Yung Bleu/Drake
[00:03.58]Lyrics by：Aubrey Graham/Jeremy Biddle/Nate Rhoads
[00:07.16]Yung Bleu：
[00:07.60]If I ever
[00:10.30]If I ever made you angry girl
[00:14.56]Just know that it get better over time
[00:19.14]Time
[00:20.99]They say time heals
[00:22.55]They say time heals
[00:23.84]She can't see her life without me she so blessed still
[00:29.21]F**k that n***a you can tell him that you're mines still
[00:35.84]And she don't wanna go to sleep she angry
[00:38.63]Lately she been noticing he ain't me
[00:43.33]I wish that we can change places
[00:46.21]Don't want no new new faces
[00:48.69]She got my heartbeat racing
[00:53.29]They say time heals
[00:56.15]Don't go build no life without me 'cause you're mines still
[01:01.83]Oh and I don't wanna go unless you make me
[01:05.40]Drake：
[01:05.86]Pretty face pretty tempted
[01:07.85]
[01:09.09]But pretty taught me ugly lessons
[01:11.32]Pretty had me givin' more than I was gettin'
[01:13.62]So if pretty don't come with somethin' well then I dead it
[01:17.26]Ashamed to tell my friends how much I'd do for you
[01:19.54]'Cause they know that you would never do the same for me
[01:22.20]I wasn't lookin' for your secrets they just came to me
[01:24.98]And they contradicted everything you claimed to be
[01:28.06]I took you to the club and you hugged on somebody that I know
[01:31.74]And I know them type of hugs
[01:33.31]Same s**t I do to women when I know I used to f**k
[01:35.82]And I know they with they n***a but they never brought it up
[01:38.58]I'm down these days down to do better 'cause you know I done enough
[01:42.85]You should lay it down we'll talk about it when you're up
[01:45.43]Yung Bleu/Drake：
[01:46.00]But she don't wanna go to sleep she angry
[01:51.64]Lately she been noticin' he ain't me
[01:54.42]Yung Bleu：
[01:58.98]I wish that we can change places
[02:01.80]Don't want no new new faces
[02:04.39]She got my heartbeat racing
[02:06.81]
[02:08.85]They say time heals
[02:11.48]Don't go build no life without me 'cause you're mines still
[02:18.28]Oh and I don't wanna go unless you make me
[02:21.02]Down on my knees hopin' you take me
[02:26.08]Better tell that n***a you mine
[02:27.39]Heard you've been trying to tie the knot girl tell me you lyin'
[02:30.51]Let me beat that p***y up one more time
[02:33.17]Let me beat that p***y up one more time
[02:35.70]I know that you feen for this I know that you did not forget
[02:41.16]So don't go to sleep
[02:42.48]And she don't wanna go to sleep she angry
[02:45.29]Lately she been noticing he ain't me
[02:52.86]I wish that we can change places
[02:55.61]Don't want no new new faces
[02:58.26]She got my heartbeat racing
[03:02.95]They say time heals
[03:05.59]Don't go build no life without me 'cause you're mines still
[03:11.54]Oh and I don't wanna go unless you make me
[03:15.04]Lately I've been gone I'm feelin' crazy
[03:19.48]Yeah I'm from the bricks we got a whole lot of bricks
[03:21.94]You got a whole lotta tricks and I wanna see what you do with them
data.trans:
[ti:You're Mines Still(feat. Drake) (Explicit)]
[ar:Yung Bleu/Drake]
[al:You're Mines Still (feat. Drake) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.58]//
[00:07.16]//
[00:07.60]如果我有
[00:10.30]如果我有惹你生气 女孩
[00:14.56]你要明白 时间会抚平一切
[00:19.14]时间
[00:20.99]他们说时间有治愈的能力
[00:22.55]他们说时间有治愈的能力
[00:23.84]她想象不到没有我的生活是怎样 她还是这样幸运
[00:29.21]让那小子给我一边去 你可以告诉他你还名花有主
[00:35.84]她不愿乖乖去睡觉 她气愤不已
[00:38.63]她现在发现那个男人完全不能跟我相比
[00:43.33]我希望我们可以换个地方
[00:46.21]不想去认识新的面孔
[00:48.69]她让我的心扑通扑通直跳
[00:53.29]他们说时间有治愈的能力
[00:56.15]不要去谋划没有我的生活 因为你依然还属于我
[01:01.83]我不想离开 除非你把我赶走
[01:05.40]//
[01:05.86]漂亮脸蛋 十足诱惑
[01:07.85]
[01:09.09]但是美色误人 我得到了惨痛的教训
[01:11.32]被美色诱惑 不断付出却得不到什么补偿
[01:13.62]所以若是美人对我没有想法 那我就彻底完蛋
[01:17.26]没有脸告诉我的朋友们 我为你做了多少
[01:19.54]因为他们知道 你永远不会给我同等的回报
[01:22.20]我没有窥视你的秘密 它们自己传到了我的耳朵里
[01:24.98]我从你口中了解到的你的一切 全都被一一反驳
[01:28.06]我把你带去俱乐部 你拥抱了几个我的熟面孔
[01:31.74]我知道那样的拥抱意味着什么
[01:33.31]我过去也曾这样流连花丛中
[01:35.82]我知道他们是团伙行动 但他们从来不会提起
[01:38.58]这些日子我心情低落 希望未来可以更好 因为你知道我已经为你倾尽了所有
[01:42.85]你应该躺下来 在缠绵之时和我好好聊一聊
[01:45.43]//
[01:46.00]但她不愿乖乖去睡觉 她气愤不已
[01:51.64]她现在发现那个男人完全不能跟我相比
[01:54.42]//
[01:58.98]我希望我们可以换个地方
[02:01.80]不想去认识新的面孔
[02:04.39]她让我的心扑通扑通直跳
[02:06.81]
[02:08.85]他们说时间有治愈的能力
[02:11.48]不要去谋划没有我的生活 因为你依然还属于我
[02:18.28]我不想离开 除非你把我赶走
[02:21.02]双膝跪地 希望你能带我走
[02:26.08]最好告诉那家伙 你是我的
[02:27.39]听说你一直都想要迈入婚姻殿堂 女孩 告诉我你是在说谎
[02:30.51]让我再一次品尝你身体的味道
[02:33.17]让我再一次品尝你身体的味道
[02:35.70]我知道你为此着迷 我知道你没有忘记
[02:41.16]所以不要闭上双眼进入梦乡
[02:42.48]她不愿乖乖去睡觉 她气愤不已
[02:45.29]她现在发现那个男人完全不能跟我相比
[02:52.86]我希望我们可以换个地方
[02:55.61]不想去认识新的面孔
[02:58.26]她让我的心扑通扑通直跳
[03:02.95]他们说时间有治愈的能力
[03:05.59]不要去谋划没有我的生活 因为你依然还属于我
[03:11.54]我不想离开 除非你把我赶走
[03:15.04]最近我有些失去理智 我变得有些疯狂
[03:19.48]我不愿放下过去 我们亲手搭建起了这些
[03:21.94]你有数不尽的把戏 我想看看你到底有什么目的
